template.name: Agent List_By Client with Specs (pdf) v1.2
template.template_md:
{% block content %} ~~A cover~~ # Agent List for {{client.name}}
Company 123 anywhere st City, State zip
me@here.com https://example.com
~~/A~~ ~~A~~ {{ client.name }} Agents List
{% for item in data_sources.agentAllFields %} {% endfor %}
Agent Info Site Name
Name:
User:
OS:
Last Seen:
 {{ item.hostname }}
{{ item.last_logged_in_user }}
{{ item.operating_system.split(',')[0] if item.operating_system else 'N/A' }}
{{ item.last_seen.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M') }}
 CPU:
RAM:
Disks:
 {{ item.wmi_detail.cpu[0][0].Name.replace('(R)', '').replace('(TM)', '').split('@')[0].strip() if item.wmi_detail and item.wmi_detail.cpu and item.wmi_detail.cpu[0][0].Name else 'N/A' }}
{{ item.total_ram }}GB
{% for disk in item.disks %} {% if not loop.previtem or loop.previtem.device != disk.device %} {{ disk.device }} {{ disk.total }}
{% endif %} {% else %} N/A
{% endfor %} 		{{ item.site__name }}
~~/A~~ {% endblock %}
template.template_variables:
data_sources:
  agentAllFields:
    only:
      - hostname
      - operating_system
      - last_seen
      - last_logged_in_user
      - site__name
      - wmi_detail
      - total_ram
      - disks
    filter:
      site__client_id: "{{client.id}}"
    model: agent
